title: 3 and Out - Stafford's LA Revival, Brady Retirement Limbo, Josh McDaniels --> Raiders, Coach/GM News, Free Trevor Lawrence, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Stafford's LA Revival, Brady Retirement Limbo, Josh McDaniels --> Raiders, Coach/GM News, Free Trevor Lawrence, Mailbag
description:
John discusses the renaissance of Matt Stafford's career after leaving Detroit, the confusion surrounding Tom Brady's reported retirement, if Josh McDaniels can win with the Raiders despite their historic dysfunction, why Bears new GM Ryan Poles should can the false bravado, and why the Jags coaching search is a complete joke. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
